name: node-js

conflicts.name: %gcc@:4.8
conflicts.description: node-js: fails to build with gcc 4.8 (see https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/19310

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: icu4c
variants.description: Build with support for all locales instead of just English

variants.name: openssl
variants.description: Build with Spacks OpenSSL instead of the bundled version

variants.name: zlib
variants.description: Build with Spacks zlib instead of the bundled version

description:
Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime
environment.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.

dependencies.name: icu4c
dependencies.description:
ICU is a mature, widely used set of C/C++ and Java libraries providing
Unicode and Globalization support for software applications. ICU4C is
the C/C++ interface.

dependencies.name: openssl
dependencies.description:
OpenSSL is an open source project that provides a robust, commercial-
grade, and full-featured toolkit for the Transport Layer Security (TLS)
and Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) protocols. It is also a general-purpose
cryptography library.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-immaterial
dependent_to.description:
An adaptation of the popular mkdocs-material theme for the Sphinx
documentation tool.

dependent_to.name: malt
dependent_to.description:
MALT is a memory profile tool to track mallocs in a C/C++ application
and report allocation information (lifetime, sizes...) in a friendly web
graphical interface by annotating the source code and proving charts.

dependent_to.name: npm
dependent_to.description: npm: A package manager for javascript.

dependent_to.name: rstudio
dependent_to.description: RStudio is an integrated development environment (IDE) for R.

dependent_to.name: yarn
dependent_to.description: Fast, reliable, and secure dependency management.

dependent_to.name: prometheus
dependent_to.description:
Prometheus, a Cloud Native Computing Foundation project, is a systems
and service monitoring system.
